name: Mobinett Interactive
tag_list: mobile-development, web-development, social-integration, mobile, loyalty, rewards, gamification, game-mechanics, social-media, networking, crm
overview:
Mobinett Interactive, Inc. is a Boston-area startup specializing in designing, developing and deploying Location-enabled mobile and social platforms. Mobinett’s platforms incorporate social media, game mechanics and other features to provide users with engaging, fun and addictive experiences. Analytics track user activity, allowing calculation of ROI.

Providing quality, cost-effective mobile and web development services to businesses of all sizes. Based in Cambridge, MA, Mobinett does fixed-budget projects and warranties their work to protect clients from unexpected costs. Request a free consultation for your project today! 1-877-704-6662 http://mobinett.com

Mobinett also offers our own social platforms, geared towards retail stores, brands and experience providers:

HubEngage is a location-based, mobile social CRM product that enables brands and retailers of all sizes increase future revenue by effectively engaging and offering loyalty rewards to their customers. http://hubengage.com

Bandwagon connects young consumers with experience providers through a fun social platform that allows people to create “bandwagons” (events) around discounted or free deals or experiences, such as arts & entertainment, physical activities, get-aways, social events and more! People can invite all their friends and/or make their bandwagons public. This engaging forum allows users to discuss deals and bandwagons and easily share them on facebook. http://hoponbandwagon.com
